description: fmt: minor tweak of package doc to show headings in godoc

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=02d19a48d066 ***

fmt: minor tweak of package doc to show headings in godoc

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5781052

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Godoc's output for fmt is less structured than
it could.  See http://imgur.com/OB3X9
This file is machine generated (mkdoc.sh), so this isn't going to cut it.

Actually, I was confused. These changes are okay, but revert the "Format errors" one. Only "Printing" and "Scanning" should be headings. ("Format errors" is a subsection of "Printing")

http://codereview.appspot.com/5781052/diff/2001/src/pkg/fmt/doc.go
File src/pkg/fmt/doc.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5781052/diff/2001/src/pkg/fmt/doc.go#newcode112
src/pkg/fmt/doc.go:112: Format errors
don't change this one

PTAL

http://codereview.appspot.com/5781052/diff/2001/src/pkg/fmt/doc.go
File src/pkg/fmt/doc.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5781052/diff/2001/src/pkg/fmt/doc.go#newcode112
src/pkg/fmt/doc.go:112: Format errors
On 2012/03/08 10:51:32, adg wrote:
> don't change this one

Done.

subject: code review 5781052: fmt: minor tweak of package doc to show headings in godoc
